item.title: Composition Process
item.description: Composition is a large part of my Taiko Journey that I ’ve only recently embarked on. I’ve learned from many teachers what composition is and have gotten into composing myself: on my DAW, Taiko, or for my ensemble Jiten Daiko. Here’s my favorite advice I find myself thinking about a lot. Just start Don’t be delicate about the composition process. It’s just like writing a diary entry to typing out a sentence.
